name: sandbox
description: Fullstack sandbox with MobX + TanStack Query integration

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=packages/common && npm install --workspace=packages/server && npm install --workspace=packages/client
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=packages/common && npm run lint --workspace=packages/server && npm run lint --workspace=packages/client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=packages/common && npm run lint:fix --workspace=packages/server && npm run lint:fix --workspace=packages/client
scripts.ts:check: npm run ts:check --workspace=packages/common && npm run ts:check --workspace=packages/server && npm run ts:check --workspace=packages/client
